message.content:
cs.IR, cs.DL, cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.CY 

The paper discusses the use of semantic indexing to generate a contextual overview of topics and visually compare clusters of articles. It applies this method to the Astro dataset of articles in astronomy and astrophysics. The paper also discusses the assignment of articles to different clustering solutions as an additional element of their bibliographic record. These topics are closely related to information retrieval (cs.IR), digital libraries (cs.DL), computational linguistics (cs.CL), social and information networks (cs.SI), and computers and society (cs.CY).
